metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7952 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: X.org libXtst before 1.2.3 allows remote X servers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a reply in the (1) XRecordStartOfData, (2) XRecordEndOfData, or (3) XRecordClientDied category without a client sequence and with attached data.

notes.Note: sbeattie> same commit as CVE-2016-7951 msalatore> patch released in 2:1.2.2-1+deb8u1

criterions.comment: libxtst package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.2.3-1').
